Structs/File.html#/s:6DotEnv4FileV4pathS.name: path
Structs/File.html#/s:6DotEnv4FileV4pathS.abstract: An absolute path to an environment file in the file system. Defaults to nil.

Structs/File.html#/s:6DotEnv4FileV_4path.name: init(_:path:)
Structs/File.html#/s:6DotEnv4FileV_4path.abstract: Initializes a new instance with the source and optionally path parameters.

Structs/SyntaxError.html#/s:6DotEnv11Syn.name: filePath
Structs/SyntaxError.html#/s:6DotEnv11Syn.abstract: An absolute path to an environment file where an error occured. Defaults to nil when an instance of File is created without a path.

Structs/SyntaxError.html#/s:6DotEnv11Syn.name: line
Structs/SyntaxError.html#/s:6DotEnv11Syn.abstract: A line in an environment file where an error occured.

Structs/SyntaxError.html#/s:6DotEnv11Syn.name: column
Structs/SyntaxError.html#/s:6DotEnv11Syn.abstract: A column in an environment file where an error occured.

Structs/FileError.html#/s:6DotEnv9FileEr.name: filePath
Structs/FileError.html#/s:6DotEnv9FileEr.abstract: An absolute path to an environment file where an error occured. Defaults to nil when an instance of File is created without a path.

Structs/FileError.html.name: FileError
Structs/FileError.html.abstract: An error thrown when an environment file being loaded either doesn’t exist or its source is not encodable.

Structs/SyntaxError.html.name: SyntaxError
Structs/SyntaxError.html.abstract: An error thrown when the source of an environment file being parsed is invalid.

Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.name: fileNotEncodable
Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.abstract: Fired when an environment file is not encodable.

Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.name: fileNotFound
Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.abstract: Fired when an environment file can’t be found in the file system.

Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.name: invalidVariableName(_:)
Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.abstract: Fired when the name of an environment variable has an invalid character.

Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.name: invalidVariableValue(_:)
Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.abstract: Fired when the value of an environment variable is invalid.

Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.name: unknownError
Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.abstract: Fired as a fallback for an unknown error.

Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.name: unterminatedString
Enums/ErrorType.html#/s:6DotEnv9ErrorTyp.abstract: Fired when the value of an environment variable is not closed with double quotes.

Enums/ErrorType.html.name: ErrorType
Enums/ErrorType.html.abstract: A collection of all error types that can occur.

Classes/DotEnv/Configuration/Caching.htm.name: costLimit
Classes/DotEnv/Configuration/Caching.htm.abstract: Limits the amount of memory usage in RAM.

Classes/DotEnv/Configuration/Caching.htm.name: countLimit
Classes/DotEnv/Configuration/Caching.htm.abstract: Limits the number of objects in RAM.

Classes/DotEnv/Configuration/Caching.htm.name: isEnabled
Classes/DotEnv/Configuration/Caching.htm.abstract: Indicates whether caching is enabled or not.

Classes/DotEnv/Configuration/Caching.htm.name: init(costLimit:countLimit:isEnabled:)
Classes/DotEnv/Configuration/Caching.htm.abstract: Initializes a new instance of CachingConfiguration with the costLimit, countLimit, and isEnabled parameters.

Classes/DotEnv/Configuration.html#/s:6Do.name: init(caching:)
Classes/DotEnv/Configuration.html#/s:6Do.abstract: Initializes a new instance of Configuration with the default caching configuration.

Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC3allSDy.name: all
Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC3allSDy.abstract: All read-only system and user-defined environment variables.

Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC13confi.name: init(configuration:)
Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC13confi.abstract: Initializes a new instance of DotEnv with the default configuration.

Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC8readFi.name: readFile(at:encoding:)
Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC8readFi.abstract: Reads the source of an environment file or throws FileError.

Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC9parseF.name: parseFile(_:)
Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC9parseF.abstract: Parses and extracts environment variables from the source of an environment file or throws SyntaxError.

Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC9parseF.name: parseFile(at:encoding:)
Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC9parseF.abstract: Reads, parses, and extracts environment variables from the source of an environment file or throws either FileError or SyntaxError.

Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC4load_9.name: load(_:overwrite:)
Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC4load_9.abstract: Parses, extracts, and sets enviroment variables from the source of an environment file or throws either FileError or SyntaxError.

Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC4load2a.name: load(at:encoding:overwrite:)
Classes/DotEnv.html#/s:6DotEnvAAC4load2a.abstract: Reads, parses, extracts, and sets enviroment variables from the source of an environment file or throws either FileError or SyntaxError.

Classes/DotEnv.html.name: DotEnv
Classes/DotEnv.html.abstract: Reads, parses, loads, and caches environment files and variables.
